content.title: On Earth
content.content: 1898 - Vera Chapman, founder of The Tolkien Society, is born.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3019:
Éomer and Éowyn depart for Rohan with Elladan and Elrohir to set their land in order.
